altersRush.title: Alters Rush
altersRush.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Avoid fighting other enemies as much as possible and defeat the "Cicurio" that awaits in the final area.

greatWall.title: Great Wall
greatWall.description: This Trainia tests the combat skills of each ARKS. Make full use of your combat abilities as a Daedal Sword awaits you in the final area.

aeroRunner.title: Aero Runner
aeroRunner.description: This Trainia tests the flight skills of each ARKS. Use the "Photon Glide" to reach the point target.
aeroRunner.subMission2: Clear while falling fewer than 5 time(s)
